subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Louisiana State linebacker Derrick Odom was charged with a misdemeanor yesterday, accused of smashing a car window after a brawl at a nightclub last week. Soon afterward, Coach Les Miles kicked Odom off the team.Odom faces one count of simple criminal damage to property, according to the Baton Rouge police. Miles said Odom was dismissed as was walk-on linebacker Jeremy Benton. The backup quarterback Ryan Perrilloux, who was also in the fight but was not charged, will remain on the team but will not play Saturday, when No. 3 L.S.U. faces No. 17 Alabama in Tuscaloosa, Miles said.
